artfilters: 1. Pop Art, 2. Soft Focus, 3. Pale & Light Color, 4. Grainy Film, 5. Pin Hole, 6. Diorama, 7. Dramatic Tone, 8. Fish Eye, 9. Sparkle, 10. Reflection, 11. Fragmented
videomode: 1080 60p, 1080p, 720p, VGA, HS120fps, HS240fps *When shooting 1080 60p/1080p/720p movies, use SDHC class6 (speed class)/SDXC class6 or higher for best results. *High-Speed Movie Size HS120fps: 640x480 HS240fps: 432x324
batterylife: 300 shots; 91 minutes continuous video shooting (CIPA DC-002)
shootingmodesmodedial: Intelligent Auto (iAUTO), Program Auto (P), Super Macro, Scene Modes (18), Art Filters (11), Panorama, Hand-Held Starlight, e-Portrait
selftimer: 2 sec, 12 sec, Custom Self-Timer (1-30 sec start timer, 1-10 pictures, 1-3 sec interval)
scenemodes: 1. Portrait, 2. Landscape, 3. Interval Shooting, 4. Night Scene, 5. Night + Portrait, 6. Sport, 7. Indoor, 8. Self Portrait, 9. Sunset, 10. Fireworks, 11. Cuisine, 12. Documents, 13. Beach & Snow, 14. Under Water Snapshot, 15. Under Water Wide1, 16. Under Water Wide2, 17. Under Water Macro, 18. Backlight HDR
outerconnectors: Multi-terminal (USB Connector, DC Jack, Audio/Video Output), HDMI Type D
playbackediteffects: Still Image: Resize, Crop, Red Eye Fix, Shadow Adjustment
flashmodes: Auto, Red Eye Reduction, Fill-in, Off, LED
zoom: 5x Optical Zoom + 2x Super Resolution Zoom + 4x Digital Zoom
focusmode: Face Detection AF, Spot AF, AF Tracking
intervalshooting: 1-99 frames, 0-60 min start timer, 10sec-60min interval time
